thread.title: Javier Bardem & Ghost Sharks Run Riot In New ‘Pirates of the Caribbean 5’ Trailer
thread.title_full: Javier Bardem & Ghost Sharks Run Riot In New ‘Pirates of the Caribbean 5’ Trailer

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Javier Bardem & Ghost Sharks Run Riot In New ‘Pirates of the Caribbean 5’ Trailer
text:
Walt Disney has released a third trailer for Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales , and it gives us our best look at Javier Bardem’s mad, bad villain — Captain Salazar.
The new trailer sets out the new movie from the perspective of Bardem’s character, and it looks like Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp) and his new crew, Carina (Kaya Scodelario) and Henry (Brenthon Thwaites) are going to have their work cut out to stop the crazed Spanish captain.
It also turns out that they won’t just have to stop Salazer: the trailer shows an army of ghost sailors, and even what appear to be ghost sharks. Yes, you read that right, ghost sharks .
Disney is releasing Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales on May 26, 2017. Watch the new trailer above.
In other news, Kate Moss is the latest star to flex in Louis Vuitton x Supreme .
